description.raw:
This pull request implements the ROS 1.0 cygwin ci script. This is particularly interesting since it uses jenkins DSL to create the `roscygwin-ci_daily-cygwin64` jenkins job (configuration as code).

 * The `roscywgin_compilation.dsl` acts as a seed. The [_dsl_roscygwin](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ros/view/ros_cygwin/job/_dsl_roscygwin/) jenkins job was configured manually and run the `jenkins-scripts/cygwin/dsl/roscywgin_compilation.dsl`.
 * The [roscygwin-ci_daily-cygwin64](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ros/view/ros_cygwin/job/roscygwin-ci_daily-cygwin64) is automatically generated and should not be manually modified. Once it is created, if we run again the dsl seed, the configuration will be updated and all the history kept.
 * The good thing is that we can embed groovy code into the dsl file to create any number of jobs and shared code between the jenkins jobs configurations.
description.html:
This pull request implements the ROS 1.0 cygwin ci script. This is particularly interesting since it uses jenkins DSL to create the roscygwin-ci_daily-cygwin64 jenkins job (configuration as code).

  • The roscywgin_compilation.dsl acts as a seed. The _dsl_roscygwin jenkins job was configured manually and run the jenkins-scripts/cygwin/dsl/roscywgin_compilation.dsl.
  • The roscygwin-ci_daily-cygwin64 is automatically generated and should not be manually modified. Once it is created, if we run again the dsl seed, the configuration will be updated and all the history kept.
  • The good thing is that we can embed groovy code into the dsl file to create any number of jobs and shared code between the jenkins jobs configurations.
